eventHandlers.name: cellValueChanged

properties.name: columnDefs

parsedColDefs:
[{
        field: 'make',
    cellEditor: 'select',
    cellEditorParams : { values: 'AG_LITERAL_carBrands' },
    filter: 'agSetColumnFilter',
    refData: 'AG_LITERAL_carMappings' },
    {
        field: 'exteriorColour',
    minWidth: 150,
    cellEditor: 'agRichSelectCellEditor',
    cellEditorPopup: true,
    cellEditorParams : {
    values: 'AG_LITERAL_colours',
    cellRenderer: 'AG_LITERAL_colourCellRenderer'
 },
    filter: 'agSetColumnFilter',
    filterParams : { cellRenderer: 'AG_LITERAL_colourCellRenderer' },
    refData: 'AG_LITERAL_colourMappings',
    cellRenderer: 'AG_LITERAL_colourCellRenderer' },
    {
        field: 'interiorColour',
    minWidth: 150,
    filter: 'agSetColumnFilter',
    filterParams : { cellRenderer: 'AG_LITERAL_colourCellRenderer' },
    refData: 'AG_LITERAL_colourMappings',
    cellRenderer: 'AG_LITERAL_colourCellRenderer' },
    {
        headerName: 'Retail Price',
    field: 'price',
    minWidth: 140,
    colId: 'retailPrice',
    valueGetter: "AG_FUNCTION_function (params) {\n    return params.data.price;\n}",
    valueFormatter: 'AG_LITERAL_currencyFormatter',
    valueSetter: 'AG_LITERAL_numberValueSetter' },
    {
        headerName: 'Retail Price (incl Taxes)',
    minWidth: 205,
    editable: false,
    valueGetter: "AG_FUNCTION_function (params) {\n    // example of chaining value getters\n    return params.getValue(\'retailPrice\') * 1.2;\n}",
    valueFormatter: 'AG_LITERAL_currencyFormatter' }]
